title: Something's wrong with Cam Newton, Week 2 Picks Against the Spread (Football 9/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Bucs beating the Panthers on Thursday Night Football (1:00). The guys analyze what's wrong with Cam Newton (2:00) and address the poor officiating throughout the game (13:00), as well as what worked for Tampa Bay and Jameis Winston (21:00). Then, Will chats with Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 2 gambling advice (32:00). They cover all 15 games on Sunday and Monday, breaking down trends and issuing their picks and best bets of the week. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
